Greets Agent 6 - Look Up Record➛...➛Name,

 

Your mission, should you choose to accept it: Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Description.

This requires you to deploy asset 6 - Look Up Record➛...➛Asset ID.

Good luck Agent.
